name: AWS Infrastructure Automation
points: Designed highly available VPC architecture with public and private subnets.
Created reusable Terraform modules with remote state in S3 and DynamoDB.
Reduced provisioning time from hours to minutes.

name: Amazon EKS Application Deployment
points: Deployed Dockerized applications on Amazon EKS.
Configured Kubernetes Deployments, Services, ConfigMaps, and Secrets.
Integrated Prometheus and Grafana for monitoring.
